title: Canon Inc font type
content:
Hi,

Am looking for the font type of Canon Inc.

Can anyone please help?

Need to know the font type and where to obtain the font

Cheers
author: keisuoke1977

comments.content: The font is called Denda New. Read more about it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20100309133917/http:/typophile.com/node/14527)...
